SELECT coursedata_no, coursedata_title, coursedata_writer, coursedata_content, to_char(coursedata_registerdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as coursedata_registerdate, coursedata_file, coursedata_status, course_no FROM board_coursedata
coursedata_title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
coursedata_content like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
coursedata_writer like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
mapper.select: SELECT c.course_no, course_summary, course_name, course_subject, course_level, course_time, course_totalperson, course_room, course_plan, course_pay, to_char(course_registerdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as course_registerdate, course_status, to_char(course_startdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as course_startdate, to_char(course_enddate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as course_enddate, c.teacher_no, teacher_id, teacher_name, teacher_phone, teacher_photo, to_char(teacher_registerdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as teacher_registerdate, teacher_thumb, teacher_status FROM teacher t INNER JOIN course c ON c.teacher_no = t.teacher_no WHERE course_no = #{course_no}

SELECT coursedata_no, coursedata_title, coursedata_writer, coursedata_content, to_char(coursedata_registerdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as coursedata_registerdate, coursedata_file, coursedata_status, course_no FROM( SELECT list.*, rownum as rnum FROM( SELECT * FROM board_coursedata WHERE course_no = #{course_no} ORDER BY coursedata_registerdate DESC ) list ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN 1 and 5
